full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN BYAMS MGON LA PHYAG MCHOD THUGS RGYUD BSKUL TSUL DGE BA'I MYU GU 'PHEL BYED KYI BYIN RLABS CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @063A *, ,(ZHES RJE BTZUN BYAMS PA MGON PO LA PHYAG MCHOD THUGS RGYUD BSKUL TSUL DGE BA'I LO TOG SMIN BYED BYIN RLABS CHAR @063B 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RGYAL BA BTZONG KHA PA DANG DBYER MA MCHIS PA MCHOG SPRUL DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOS LEN PA'I MTHUS, LHA MCHOG 'DI LA MOS GUS CUNG ZAD RNYED PA BTZUN GZUGS DKON MCHOG BSTAN 'DZIN RAB RGYAS KYIS, RJE BTZONG KHA PA DANG, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN DANG, YONGS 'DZIN YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN RNAMS KYI GSUNG 'BUM LAS BYAMS MGON GYI BSTOD GSOL SMON TSIG SOGS THOR BUR BYUNG BA RNAMS PHYOGS GCIG TU BSDEBS TE 'DON BSGRIGS SU BKOD PA'I THOG ,DUS PHYIS DPE CHA NYID GUNG THANG RIN PO CHE'I DRUNG DU PHUL NAS ZHUS DAG MDZAD PAR ZHUS PA NA, @064A *, ,DAM PA NYID NAS SPYAN 'DREN GYI MGO'I SNYAN GSAN DANG, MAndAL GYI 'DOD GSOL DANG, YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN DU SKYE BA'I SMON LAM GSUM BSNAN TE 'DON CHA 'DI BZHIN BYAS NA BZANG NGO ZHES BKA' GSAL GNANG BAR MDZAD PA YIN NO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
